HeadComp.title: SMS Campaign| MSG91-Philippines
HeadComp.description: Enhance your B2B marketing strategy with advanced automation tools and sales funnel builders. Execute drip email campaigns and streamline sales effectively.

BannerComp.heading: Connect conversations across Channels and tools.
BannerComp.subheading: Deliver personalized, engaging and seamless experiences

features.name: Multi channel support
features.content: Support your customers on their preferred channel.Give your customers a better support experience via their preferred channel- SMS, Email, Voice, Push Notification, WhatsApp and more. Meet your customers where they are.

features.name: Draggable Flow
features.content: Drag and drop to create an omnichannel flow with ‘if-then’ scenarios.Choose when you need to initiate an SMS, email, or messaging conversation in a single workflow. Create a flow that is as simple or as complex as your business needs them to be.

features.name: Time Based Condition
features.content: Send perfectly timed automated messages.Build a thoughtful sending schedule with time-based conditions that control the time zone of when your campaigns are delivered. Support your customers at the right time.

features.name: API based Conditions
features.content: Get information instantly for real-time interactions.Call for data even when in mid of a flow by sending data to a third-party system or requesting data needed for your communication steps. Deliver real-time information to your customers.

features.name: Country Based Condition
features.content: Support your customers across the world.Create personalized and memorable experiences for your customer across countries, languages, content, channels, flows and more. Easily connect, customize and communicate.

PreFooterComp.content: Start building your ideal customer engagement experience
